description: In der Nachbarschaft wurde 1937 das „Institut f√ºr Meereskunde“ der Universit√§t Kiel gegr√ºndet.Suche auf einer gedachten Linie von Silvia √ºber Hellmuth in ca. 15 m Entfernung den Ilex (Stechpalme).Viel Gl√ºck!----------------------------------------------Near by the „F√∂rdewanderweg“ you can find an old tree, which was born in 1788 and is still healthy.In the neighbourhood the „Institut for Marine Research“ was founded as a university department in 1937.Search the holly at a distance of approx. 15 m on a line going from Silvia over Hellmuth.Good luck and enjoy!¬© Mangie, Opencaching.de, CC BY-NC-ND, Stand: 07.05.2018;alle Logeintr√§ge ¬© jeweiliger Autor
